column1: Uchi////Uchi finally got it right for me this time.  We didn't have to wait for our reserved table (though granted I intentionally made a later reservation at 8:30 this time)
column2: and every single dish we got was OUTSTANDING. We even let our waiter surprise us with one dish this time
column3: which I was hesitant to do after my last bad experience
column4: but he gave us one of the best dishes of the night! It was mussels with honeydew and basil and cilantro
column5: and it didn't look like much but the flavors together were magic.  Best Uchi visit yet!
